ThingDef.label: Networked Lung
ThingDef.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic Lungs, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.

ThingDef.label: Networked Kidney
ThingDef.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic Kidneys, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.

ThingDef.label: Networked Liver
ThingDef.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic Livers, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.
